definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
to warm up/to heat up/hot (of weather)/heat/fervent

sentences.english: It's also extremely low in calories and delicious.
sentences.chinese: 而且也是低熱量的美味。

sentences.english: The best diet for your dog is one that is appropriately low in calories.
sentences.chinese: 對於狗來說最佳飲食要當低熱量莫數了。

sentences.english: Combustibility of producer gas is compared with other fuel gas to use rationally low calorific value gas.
sentences.chinese: 對其燃燒特性進行比較，以利於合理使用低熱值煤氣。

sentences.english: How many men do you know who eat low-calorie or fat-free anything ?
sentences.chinese: 看看有幾個男人專喫低熱或者去脂食品？

sentences.english: Concrete with low-heat and micro-expanding cement is a compensating contraction concrete.
sentences.chinese: 低熱微膨脹水泥混凝土是一種補償收縮混凝土。

sentences.english: So is grilled chicken or a green salad with low-cal dressing.
sentences.chinese: 因此是烤雞或與低熱量的選礦的一道蔬菜沙拉。

sentences.english: There are plenty of tasty alcohol mixed drinks that are on the low calorie side.
sentences.chinese: 其實有很多美味的調酒都是低熱量的。

sentences.english: The cold reduces pain and may decrease the effect of the heat on the tissue .
sentences.chinese: 冷水可以減輕疼痛並減低熱對組織的作用。

sentences.english: Both coal gangue and coal bed methane are low heating value fuels.
sentences.chinese: 煤矸石和含甲烷量較低的煤層氣均屬於低熱值的燃料。

sentences.english: Your host might appreciate being able to offer a low-calorie option to guests.
sentences.chinese: 邀請人可能會同意準備一種低熱量酒給他們的客人。

sentences.english: There are numerous available recipes that can meet the low calorie requirement.
sentences.chinese: 有許多能滿足低熱量的要求的可用食譜。

sentences.english: Chandon believes there'sa growing market for low calorie, smaller portion products.
sentences.chinese: 尚東認爲，有日益增長的市場爲低熱量，小部分產品。

sentences.english: To keep your waistline from expanding, choose low-calorie or pure juices without any added sugar.
sentences.chinese: 研究人員建議選擇低熱量果汁或無糖純果汁。

sentences.english: Common symptoms include low fever, but sometimes high fever.
sentences.chinese: 多表現爲低熱，但有時也可以是高熱。

sentences.english: The extensive utilization of lower-grade fuels is at present our national energy policy.
sentences.chinese: 充分利用低熱值燃料是目前國家的能源政策之一。

definition: (of food) to retain in stomach due to indigestion (TCM)
bacterial tracheitis (inflammation of the windpipe, often caused by Staphylococcus aureus)/henpecked (a pun on 妻子管得严 used in comic theater)
to show an effect/to produce an effect/a conspicuous effect
(TCM) consumptive disease, chronic deficiency disorder due to impaired function of inner organs, deficiency of qi, blood, yin and yang/asthenia
injury such as contusion, sprain or fracture from falling, blow etc
to reduce the pressure (of a fluid)/to lower one's blood pressure/to lower (or step down) the voltage
